citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The indoor floors that dogs contact have a routine of daily spot cleaning and were clean during inspection, however the
north outdoor runs had areas of excreta stuck to the floors and the licensee said a routine of daily spot cleaning isn't in
place for those areas. Daily removal of waste on surfaces dogs can touch is required and helps promote animal health
and comfort. Ensure to develop and maintain a daily spot clean of all surfaces dogs can touch.
***Correct from 1/30/2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The indoor floors that dogs contact have a routine of daily spot cleaning and were clean during inspection, however the 
north outdoor runs had areas of excreta stuck to the floors and the licensee said a routine of daily spot cleaning isn't in 
place for those areas. Daily removal of waste on surfaces dogs can touch is required and helps promote animal health 
and comfort. Ensure to develop and maintain a daily spot clean of all surfaces dogs can touch.  
***Correct from 1/30/2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
